Title: Relates to the review of major transportation projects
Summary: Relates to the review of major transportation projects; provides that commissioners, deputy commissioners and managerial personnel who participate in the decision-making process to authorize changes in traffic patterns shall be subject to criminal and civil liability for certain damage to persons, animals or property.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-101.2, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the review of major transportation projects
